attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are appalled that the government will spend only £56,000,000 this year on the NHS Stop Smoking campaign whilst receiving a tax income of £9,000,000,000 from tobacco tax. 
It is time that we accepted nicotine is a highly addictive drug and that it destroys peoples health. The governement should invest more money in to the NHS stop smoking services.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
